snippet: GLOBUS--Sarah, died at home on December 13, 2015. She is survived by her husband, Herschel Goldfield, her children, Ori and Vivian, and by sisters Martha Globus-Rodriguez and Laura Day. Sarah is remembered with great love and affection by her family and friends and by the community in Manhattan Valley, where she devoted many years of her life helping children and others in need as the founder of Neighborhood Kids of Harlem. Sarah graduated from Hunter College and Columbia Law School. In lieu of flowers, the family requests that donations be made to Children's Aid Society. 1/3
